title: Registration Opening
description: Assemble a team skilled in Bash or other scripting languages and take the first step toward victory.

title: Awareness Session
description: Learn the rules of bashaway while navigating the platforms in a simulated battle

title: Bashlab 1
description: Elevate your skills with guidance from industry experts. Master key concepts and gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge tech.

title: Bashlab 2
description: Continue building your expertise through advanced workshops and practical sessions.

title: Registration Closing
description: Last chance to register for Bashaway 2025! Make sure your team is ready for the challenge ahead.

title: 1st Round
description: The real battle begins today! Showcase your scripting skills and secure a spot in the next round.

title: Final Round
description: The sun rises over an intense battleground marking the beginning of Bashaway 2025's most challenging round.
